macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Price Rebounds Above $70,000 After February Sell-Off
items.summary: Bitcoin has reclaimed $70,000, trading at around $70,215 with a 2% increase over the past 24 hours, following a drop near $60,000. The rally is linked to softer-than-expected inflation data boosting rate cut expectations, with related equities like Coinbase surging 18% and MicroStrategy up 10%.[2]

items.title: Aptos Ecosystem Prepares USDCBL Stablecoin Launch
items.summary: The Decibel Foundation, incubated by Aptos Labs, is set to issue USDCBL, a protocol-native stablecoin backed by dollars via Stripe-owned Bridge, for use as collateral in on-chain perpetual futures. Its December testnet attracted over 650,000 unique accounts and a million daily trades.[1]

items.title: LCX Launches PayAgent Non-Custodial Payment Service
items.summary: LCX has launched PayAgent on February 16, 2026, as a non-custodial payment link service enabling humans and AI agents to create simple payments.[4]

items.title: DeepSnitch AI Presale Raises Over $1.59M Amid Oversold Market
items.summary: DeepSnitch AI presale has raised above $1.59M at $0.03985 per token, positioning it as a high-growth contender with live AI security tools, while Aptos appears oversold and Dogecoin remains flat.[1]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Finalists Announced for India AI Impact Summit 2026 Challenges
items.summary: Top 70 teams from over 4,650 applications across 60+ countries selected as finalists for AI For ALL, AI By HER, and YUVAi challenges, to showcase innovations in healthcare, agriculture, and more at the summit starting February 16.

items.title: India Positions as Force Multiplier in Global AI Growth Ahead of AI Impact Summit
items.summary: Tech leaders highlight India's role in AI governance, innovation, and solving global challenges like healthcare and mobility, with the AI Impact Summit 2026 set for February 16-20.

items.title: India Plans Massive AI 'Data City' to Boost Digital Growth
items.summary: India announces plans for a vast 'data city' to narrow the AI gap with the US and China, powering expansive digital infrastructure.

items.title: OpenAI Rolls Out Ads in ChatGPT for Free and Low-Cost Users
items.summary: OpenAI begins displaying ads alongside ChatGPT conversations to offset costs, following similar moves by Microsoft, Perplexity, and Google in AI interfaces.

items.title: Responsible AI Focus at India AI Impact Summit Emphasizes People, Planet, Progress
items.summary: Upcoming summit highlights India's AI advancements in flood mapping, mental health diagnosis, cancer detection, and defense, promoting human-centric and sustainable AI.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: John Wick AAA Game Adaptation Officially Revealed
items.summary: The long-rumored AAA video game based on the John Wick series has been unveiled, surprising fans with its first look at the unnamed project.

items.title: Ubisoft Reports Assassin's Creed Overperformance on Switch 2
items.summary: Ubisoft claims Assassin's Creed has overperformed this quarter, citing the Switch 2 release of Assassin's Creed Shadows as a key factor in double-digit user growth, amid ongoing restructuring and a Tencent deal.

items.title: High on Life 2 Wins Bidding War in Gaming Prediction League
items.summary: High on Life 2 surged in scores and was ultimately won by Anthania Interactive in a prediction league bidding, with multiple teams competing aggressively.

items.title: Nintendo Announces February 2026 Switch 2 Lineup Including Resident Evil Requiem
items.summary: Nintendo revealed upcoming Switch 2 games for February such as Mario Tennis Fever, Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties, REANIMAL, Resident Evil Requiem, and Resident Evil Village Gold Edition.

items.title: Pathologic 3 Hailed as Antidote to AI in Game Development
items.summary: Pathologic 3 is praised as a uniquely human-crafted experience contrasting the rise of generative AI in gaming, with developers like Ice-Pick Lodge emphasizing creative authenticity.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Trump Administration Issues Hundreds of Subpoenas to Tech Giants for User Data on ICE Critics
items.summary: The Trump administration has served administrative subpoenas to companies like Google, Meta, and Reddit seeking identifying information on Americans anonymously criticizing ICE agents online. Civil liberties groups criticize it as government overreach, while DHS defends it for agent safety.

items.title: Sony's Animated Film 'GOAT' Produced by Stephen Curry Debuts with $32 Million Over Four Days
items.summary: Sony's animated release 'GOAT,' produced by basketball star Stephen Curry, earned $26 million domestically over the weekend and $47.6 million globally including international markets. It marks the biggest animated debut since 'Elemental' in 2023.

items.title: Walt Disney Studios First to Reach $1 Billion Global Box Office in 2026
items.summary: Disney crossed $1 billion at the global box office this year, driven primarily by 'Avatar: Fire and Ash' and supported by the ongoing success of 'Zootopia 2' in its twelfth weekend.

items.title: NITI Aayog Releases 10-Year Roadmap for Technology Services Reimagination
items.summary: India's NITI Aayog’s Frontier Hub published a 'Technology Services - Reimagination Ahead' roadmap outlining a 10-year vision for tech services development.

items.title: Ministry of Defence Signs Rs 2,312 Crore Deal with HAL for 8 Dornier Aircraft Equipment
items.summary: India's MoD finalized a Rs 2,312 crore contract with Hindustan Aeronautics Limited for equipment for 8 Dornier aircraft intended for the Indian Coast Guard.
